Package entrants.utils.graph.interfaces

Interface EdgeInterface<N extends NodeInterface>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WeightedEdgeInterface<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Edge
    public interface EdgeInterface<N extends NodeInterface>
    This interface describes the features that a class that represents edges linking NodeInterface objects should offer The Edges are not oriented

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean concernsNode​(N node)
      Checks if a N Object is concerned by the current edge
      N getNeighbour​(N node)
      Retrieves the neighbour of a Node with the current edge If the given node is not concerned by the current Edge, a Null value is returned
      N getNodeA()
      Retrieves the 'nodeA' of the edge
      N getNodeB()
      Retrieves the 'nodeB' of the edge

    • Method Detail

      • getNodeA

        N getNodeA()
        Retrieves the 'nodeA' of the edge
        Returns:
        A N object

      • getNodeB

        N getNodeB()
        Retrieves the 'nodeB' of the edge
        Returns:
        A N object

      • concernsNode

        boolean concernsNode​(N node)
        Checks if a N Object is concerned by the current edge
        Parameters:
        node - The node to check
        Returns:
        True if the given node is concerned by the current edge

      • getNeighbour

        N getNeighbour​(N node)
        Retrieves the neighbour of a Node with the current edge If the given node is not concerned by the current Edge, a Null value is returned
        Parameters:
        node - A node
        Returns:
        The node's neighbour with the current edge
